definition: to set a price/to fix a price
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
to fix a price based on quality (idiom)

sentences.english: Everyone in the energy business believes that carbon-pricing will come, but when?
sentences.chinese: 能源行業的每一個人都認爲將會對碳定價，但何時呢？

sentences.english: At last, the approach is supplemented according to the value leakage.
sentences.chinese: 最後針對價值漏損隨實物期權的定價進行修正。

sentences.english: China could also clean up environmental damage caused by underpricing resources.
sentences.chinese: 中國也可以治理由於資源定價過低造成的環境破壞。

sentences.english: A performance based pricing structure instils confidence.
sentences.chinese: 性能爲基礎的定價結構灌輸信心。

sentences.english: The problem was that my carrot-stick pricing model was off.
sentences.chinese: 問題就在於我這種恩威並施的定價模式並沒有用。

sentences.english: None of the auto makers disclosed a pricing strategy in Guangzhou Monday.
sentences.chinese: 週一在廣州，沒有任何汽車商透露定價策略。

sentences.english: The electricity price shall be based on the principle of uniform policy, unified pricing and be regulated at different levels.
sentences.chinese: 電價實行統一政策，統一定價原則，分級管理。

sentences.english: Competition can have a powerful corrective effect on market inefficiencies and mis pricings.
sentences.chinese: 競爭能夠有效糾正市場的無效和錯誤定價。

sentences.english: Payment and pricing can be in IDR or USD or RMB and others currencies.
sentences.chinese: 付款和定價可以是印尼盾或美元或人民幣及其他貨幣。

sentences.english: The customer and developer negotiate a fixed price for the project.
sentences.chinese: 客戶和開發人員協商項目的固定價格。

sentences.english: You've set prices too low for your target market, though.
sentences.chinese: 但依所定的目標市場而言，你產品的定價太低。

sentences.english: How she positions and prices of their wine in the market.
sentences.chinese: 她如何對酒品進行市場定位和定價。

sentences.english: Analysts seem to like the new pricing model.
sentences.chinese: 分析師們似乎很青睞新的定價模式。

sentences.english: Shops have been closed this week so employees can reprice goods.
sentences.chinese: 商店本週關閉，以便讓店員對商品進行重新定價。

sentences.english: Often the rating engine is part of a larger billing system.
sentences.chinese: 通常定價引擎是較大的計費系統的一部分。

sentences.english: What are the Sevice Agreement an options and pricing?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是服務簡介協定的選擇和定價？

definition: to quote a price/seller's first offer
to adjust downwards/to lower (prices, wages etc)
to demote/to pass down to a lower unit
